summary: Implements a mock backend for AWS EMR Serverless within the Moto library, exposing methods that mimic the service’s API for creating, retrieving, listing, updating, starting, stopping, and deleting serverless applications, as well as initiating, cancelling, and querying job runs. Includes lightweight model classes representing applications and job runs that can be iterated and serialized to dictionaries.
business_intent: Enable developers to test and develop code that interacts with EMR Serverless without contacting real AWS services, providing a fully functional in‑memory simulation of the service’s behavior.
